title: errors on Kali Linux......
body: Window 10 is the best os ever and Kali Linux is the best app ever on windows 10.....but there are many errors in Kali Linux wsl Microsoft.....there are many app which are not working.....like airmon-ng....nmap......and many more.....please fix this guys.....

comments.body: Nmap and things like nmap require AF_Packet. Vote for that and cite your use-case. Remove this ask because it helps nobody. For NMAP specifically: Use the Windows version. Many other Kali tools work just fine.
